h1: color:#00215B; font-family:'Arboria-Bold', 'Arboria', sans-serif; font-weight:700; font-size:32px; line-height:40px;

summary: color:#00215B; font-family:'Apercu Regular Pro', 'Apercu Pro', 'Arboria', sans-serif; font-weight:700; font-size:18px; line-height:27px;
p: color:#00215B; font-family:'Apercu Regular Pro', 'Apercu Pro', 'Arboria', sans-serif; font-weight:400; font-size:18px; line-height:27px; margin: 0px 0px 10px;

li: color:#00215B; font-family:'Apercu Regular Pro', 'Apercu Pro', 'Arboria', sans-serif; font-weight:400; font-size:18px; line-height:27px;
